newsitem.title: USA: FDA to inspect Global plant in mid-May.
newsitem.headline: FDA to inspect Global plant in mid-May.

text.p: Global Pharmaceutical Corp said Wednesday that the Food and Drug Administration will inspect the company's manufacturing area in mid-May, in connection with its continuing efforts to obtain FDA certification of its plant manufacturing area and processes.
The company said that it has already discussed a number of procedural and other initiatives with the regulatory agency to assure compliance with FDA requirements.
The FDA, said the company, has advised it that an inspection to verify the effectiveness of these initiatives is necessary.
Global said that it believes this will be the final step in its certification process and that it has confidence in the facilities and in the controls and initiatives it has developed.
